title: HTML FOR BEGINNERS
requirements:
A browser like the one you are using currently to view this :) . 
 A code editor , VS Code is prefered. 
 Install Live server and Prettifier extensions.

bulletPoints.header: As the name suggests it locates the resource, the resource could be any of the folowing
bulletPoints.content:
The front end deals with the "front" of a website or application, meaning its design and coding that keep the website working properly.
The back end, however, refers to everything on the server-side of a website or application, such as important data.
 A full stack developer is a programmer who works within software development and is knowledgeable in both the front-end and back-end of an application.

subHeading.heading: Front-End
subHeading.content:
HTML :  Its the structure of the website. Used to define the layout of the webpage.
 CSS : To animate and style the layouts and contents like the font, shape of a picture and so on.
 JavaScript(JS) : To add fucntionaility to the website, to make components respond in a website , like increasing the no.of likes on click of a button and displaying the information based on user logged in. Unlike CSS and HTML this is a programming language.

bulletPoints.content:
Learn HTML and CSS 
JavaScript
Frameworks : Frameworks and libraries have reusable codes to make the development faster and easier For example : reactJS, Angular, Vue
Version Control System: These are used to keep track of project history while working on it as a team with many contributors or just you
Git is the most popular and the best version control system

sectionBlocks.heading: How the Web Works
sectionBlocks.description: The web address entered in a browser is URL (Uniform resource locator). Such as https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ .

bulletPoints.header: As the name suggests it locates the resource, the resource could be any of the folowing

more-data: When a url is entered in the browser it requests the resource from the computer the url targets to.
The browser is the client and the target computer is the server.

mini-codeblock.code:
GET /index.html HTTP/1.1
Host: www.sampleweb.com
Accept-language: en-us
mini-codeblock.description: Client is requesting to GET a page INDEX.HTML of the host www.sampleweb.com using HTTP version 1.1 using the client language english-US
